# Data

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
data <- read_csv("Data_Tables_Criminal_Incidents_Visualisation_Year_Ending_December_2019.csv")
```

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

data %>% 
  group_by(`Offence Subdivision`) %>%
  summarise(avg = mean(`Rate per 100,000 population`)) %>%
  head(10) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = fct_reorder(`Offence Subdivision`, avg), y = avg)) +
  geom_col() +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90))
  
```
B20 Property damage is the highest.
